sentences.en: An intravenous ( IV ) medication called prostaglandin E 1 is given to keep the ductus arteriosus from closing.

sentences.en: If it isn’t, a second dose of the prostaglandin gel is administered.
sentences.cn: 如果还没有开始，会开始使用前列腺素的第二种剂量。

sentences.en: If you cut out sugar, you will be allowing your body to make prostaglandin more effectively.
sentences.cn: 如果你真的不吃糖了，你的身体将会产生更多的前列腺素。

sentences.en: Objective To investigate the effect of prostaglandin E 1 on the prognosis replantation.
sentences.cn: 目的观察前列腺素E1对断指再植术预后的影响.

sentences.en: One form of this enzyme makes the prostaglandin that causes pain and swelling.
sentences.cn: 这种酶的一种形态制造了这种能够产生疼痛和扩张的前列腺素。

sentences.en: Prostaglandin El is an effective and safe drug for treatment of acute viral cholestatic hepatitis E.
sentences.cn: 脂微球载体前列腺素是治疗急性戊型淤胆型肝炎有效、安全的药物.

sentences.en: Prostaglandin is the dilation of blood vessels and inhibit platelet function.
sentences.cn: 前列腺素具有扩张血管和抑制血小板作用.

sentences.en: Results is prostaglandin E 2 in the alveolar of rats under no influences.

sentences.en: The fetus was aborted using vaginal prostaglandin.
sentences.cn: 遗传谘询后,患者决定以前列腺素引产.

sentences.en: Understand the functions of other hormones such as melatonin, prostaglandin and leptin.

trans.tran_en: any of a group of potent hormone-like compounds composed of essential fatty acids and found in all mammalian tissues, esp human semen
